name: Mistypine Academy
description:
First-person zombie-shooter mixed with a dating-sim visual-novel. Get to know classmates as you all survive at your school during a zombie apocalypse and then face the undead hordes on perilous supply runs.

Features:

- Decide how best to spend time with your classmates during the week as you prepare for upcoming supply runs.

- Venture as far as you can in supply runs that pit you against randomly assorted zombie encounters and character events.

- Quickly swap between group members during combat as the situation demands it, each with their own separate stats and weapons.

- Grow closer with your classmates as you progress through the unfolding story and ultimately decide who you will end up with.

Still needs:

- More story events

- More school mini-events

- Replace placeholder art

- Potentially revise current art

- More arenas for existing arena-layer

- More arena events for existing arena-layer

- More arena-layers

Please tell me about any bugs you find so I can try to fix them.
